subject: Request: Q2 marketing budget approval
body:
Hi,

Can you approve the Q2 marketing budget? We need a decision by Friday. Attached are the numbers.

Thanks,
Alice

subject: Meeting: Product sync (tomorrow)
body:
Hello,

Can we meet tomorrow at 10am to sync on the product roadmap? Please confirm or propose another time.

Regards,
Bob

subject: Invoice INV-2025-017 (overdue)
body:
Dear team,

Our records show invoice INV-2025-017 is overdue by 10 days. Please arrange payment or contact us to discuss.

Best,
Carol

subject: Collaboration opportunity - quick chat?
body:
Hi,

We have a potential collaboration on research. Interested in a 20-min intro call next week?

Thanks,
Dave

subject: Security patch notice - action required
body:
All,

A critical security patch is available. Please update servers by Nov 10. See attached instructions.

- Security Team

subject: Reminder: submit timesheet
body:
Hi,

Friendly reminder to submit your timesheet for the last pay period. Deadline EOD today.

Thanks,
HR

subject: Feature request: dark mode
body:
Hello,

Could you add dark mode to the product? Many users requested it. Let us know feasibility and timeline.

Regards,
Gina

subject: On-call rotation update
body:
Team,

The on-call rotation has changed. Please check the shared calendar and update your availability.

Ops

subject: Demo request from Acme Corp
body:
Hi,

Acme Corp requested a product demo next Tuesday. Can you prepare slides and confirm availability?

Thanks,
Isabel

subject: Contract review needed
body:
Please review the attached contract and share redlines by Nov 20.

- Legal

subject: Invitation: Tech conference speaker?
body:
We invite you to speak at our tech conference. Are you interested? We need confirmation by Nov 3.

Best,
Karen

subject: Volunteer for onboarding session
body:
Hey,

We need volunteers to host onboarding. Can you be available on Nov 21? Please say yes/no.

Cheers,
Li
